meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with bright yellow or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The coreopsis in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some coreopsis in my backyard for a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the coreopsis, enjoying the nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a coreopsis in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The coreopsis swayed gently in the breeze, a splash of sunshine in the yard.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants that includes the coreopsis.
meanings.sent1: Many gardeners appreciate the variety of coreopsis in the genus.
meanings.sent2: The coreopsis genus is known for its hardy and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The coreopsis plants in the genus had a family reunion in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The coreopsis genus stood out like a star in the botanical world.
meanings.sent5: Each coreopsis in the genus had its own unique charm and beauty.
